meanings.definition: A synthetic compound used as an insecticide.
meanings.sent1: The allethrin effectively killed the mosquitoes in the house.
meanings.sent2: The allethrin spray helped get rid of the pesky bugs.
meanings.sent3: The allethrin was like a superhero for our home, fighting off the insect invaders.
meanings.sent4: The allethrin spread through the air like a silent assassin, targeting the insects.
meanings.sent5: The allethrin's power to eliminate insects was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: To treat with allethrin to repel insects.
meanings.sent1: We allethrin our clothes before going camping to keep bugs away.
meanings.sent2: She allethrin the windows to prevent any insects from entering the house.
meanings.sent3: The family decided to allethrin the picnic area to avoid any uninvited insect guests.
meanings.sent4: The allethrin acted like a force field, pushing insects away from the treated area.
meanings.sent5: After allethrin the garden, the bugs steered clear of the plants.
